title: Unity Health Care's Protect Our People from COVID-19
body: Unity Health Care is excited to be a vaccination distribution site for the city and a partner in the fight to stop the spread of COVID-19.  As a designated vaccine distribution site by the District, patients and DC residents will be able to receive the COVID-19 vaccine in accordance with DC Health's phased distribution plan.  Unity Health Care now vaccinate patients ages 65+ and 18 – 64 with chronic conditions. For additional information on Unity's role in distributing the vaccine or to pre-register for an appointment, please .
